column2: the Northern Ireland Executive meets again to review Northern Ireland's Covid-19 situation and decide if further relaxations to regulations can be made.With hospitality back and people being allowed to meet indoors again
column3: what is left to decide on?For instance
column4: will we see agreement on the return of live music for the 21 June or will we be allowed to have more people round for a BBQ if the good weather holds?Our political correspondent Jayne McCormack joins Jordan Kenny live on Thursday night to answer any questions you have about what has happened and what's to come.Tune in at 19:00 BST on Thursday on the BBC News NI website
column5: the BBC iPlayer and the BBC News NI Facebook page.
